desc: About me and my business:Hi, my name is Jana and I am am the owner of a small affiliate website promoting travel coupons.The promoted products are travel coupons and deals. Between my partners are large travel companies. Here are some popular ones: [url removed, login to view], Auto Europe Car Rentals, [url removed, login to view], [url removed, login to view], CityPass, CruiseDirect, Fox Rent a Car, Lookupfare, OneTravel, Park n´ fly, [url removed, login to view], Skyscanner USA, Tours4Fun and more!My potential SEO competitors are websites like [url removed, login to view], [url removed, login to view], [url removed, login to view], [url removed, login to view] etc.. These websites offer the same type of products as I do – for example CheapOair discount, Park n´ Fly coupon, CityPass discounts etc. These products are highly searched and have generally a great buyer intent.Based on a bit of analysis only coupons for [url removed, login to view] have average use of over [url removed, login to view] daily on Retailmenot, CheapOair coupons have been used 360 times on [url removed, login to view] and 1.1 k times on Groupon etc. These are just few examples.A little complication (but no surprise) is that the brand keywords are mostly forbidden (so it´s not allowed to target directly e.g. [url removed, login to view] coupon) and we have to find and target general keywords (e.g. hotel discounts). Luckily there are lists of recommended keywords from the partners. I believe that with a smart choice of a high paying affiliate programs and your unbiased analysis and experience we can make money together.Are we a match?I am looking for a win-win cooperation with a Google Adwords consultant who is able to make profits with Google Adsense. I am looking for complete services including honest assesment of using Adwords on my site, campaign setup, campaign management and reporting. My requirements are:-	You are a freelancer or agency experience with Adwords advertising on US Google-	You have proven results, can create positive ROI and eliminate losses-	You offer complete Adwords advertising services (unbiased analysis, kw research, campaign setup, campaign management, reporting)-	You can do appropriate suggestions about website optimization for AdwordsWhat I offer?I offer 50% from all profits. If your campaign activity will make 3k, 1.5 k is for you and 1.5 k for me. If this sounds good to you, you meet the requirements above and are interested in a win-win cooperation, I would definitely love to hear from you, your experiences and your client practises. I am open to all your suggestions regarding our cooperation so we can find the way!Please allow 48 hours before I get in touch.Thank you for your message!Jana
title: Looking for a Google Adwords expert with proven results
